```python
@funsearch.evolve
def construction_heuristic(context: ConstructionContext) -> float:
    """Improved construction heuristic for CVRP using distance and capacity ratios."""
    # Calculate distance ratio (closer is better)
    dist_ratio = context.distance / context.distance_matrix[context.depot][context.candidate]
    
    # Calculate capacity ratio (more remaining capacity is better)
    remaining_capacity = context.vehicle_capacity - context.vehicle_load
    cap_ratio = remaining_capacity / context.demand
    
    # Combined score (lower is better)
    return dist_ratio * (1 / cap_ratio)
```
